description: Try our easy to follow Slow Cooker Self-Saucing Chocolate Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pudding,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chocolate pudding,Winter,Video,Jul 2020,Vegetarian,Slow cooker,Peanut free
name: Slow Cooker Self-Saucing Chocolate Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: Top ‘n’ fill caramel spread, salted caramel ice-cream, unsalted roasted peanuts, chopped and shaved (and shaved)

recipeInstructions.text: Sift flour and cocoa into a bowl, then stir in sugar and salt. Make a well in the centre, then add milk, vanilla and butter. Stir until just combined. Spoon mixture into slow cooker.

To make the sauce, place sugar, cocoa and 21/2 cups boiling water in a heatproof jug, stirring until sugar has dissolved. Pour mixture over the back of a large metal spoon over mixture in slow cooker.

Lay a tea towel on top of slow cooker, then cover with lid. Fold up overhanging tea towel so it sits on lid, not hanging down sides of slow cooker. Cook pudding on high for 1 hour 15 minutes or until centre is firm and sauce is bubbling at sides.
Divide pudding among bowls. Top with caramel spread, ice-cream, peanuts and chocolate.
